cookies.description: This website uses cookies to improve your experience.
cookies.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help improve your browsing experience and allow the site to function properly.
cookies.essentialDesc: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site. Includes cookies for accepting privacy policies and secure browsing.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Used to understand how visitors interact with the site, helping to improve user experience. These cookies do not collect personally identifiable information.
cookies.thirdPartyDesc: This site may use third-party services that set their own cookies, such as Google Analytics.
cookies.controlDesc: You can control and manage cookies in the following ways:
controlList: Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies
You can set your browser to notify you before accepting cookies
Some cookies can be managed through site settings
cookies.disableWarning: Note that disabling cookies may affect site functionality.
cookies.consentDesc: By continuing to browse this site after seeing the cookie banner, you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
cookies.changesDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically. Any changes will be communicated via the cookie banner or published on this page.
cookies.contactDesc: For questions about cookies or this policy, contact me via the form on my portfolio or by email: d.silvamarques@gmail.com
